<small>Also see: [[H6302]]</small>

 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּדָה‎</span> **verb** ==ransom== (Late Hebrew in derivatives; Phoenician in proper name; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***padû***</u></abbr>, ***id.***, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Minaean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פדית‎</span> ***redeemed*** or ***purchased land*** Mordt<sup>Beitr. 23</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּדָה‎</span> [[Lev.27.27|Lev 27:27]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּֽדְךָ‎</span> [[Job.5.20|Job 5:20]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּדִיתָ‎</span> [[Deut.9.26|Deut 9:26]] +, etc.; ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִפְדֶּה‎</span> [[Ps.49.8|Ps 49:8]] +, etc.; ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּדֵה‎</span> [[Ps.25.22|Ps 25:22]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּדֵנִי‎</span> [[Ps.26.11|Ps 26:11]] + 3 t.; ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּדֹה‎</span> [[Num.18.15|Num 18:15]]; [[Ps.49.8|Ps 49:8]] ***construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִפְדּוֺת‎</span> [[2Sam.7.23|2Sam 7:23]] = [[1Chr.17.2|1Chr 17:2]] ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פּוֺדֶה‎</span> [[Ps.34.23|Ps 34:23]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֹּדְךָ‎</span> [[Deut.13.6|Deut 13:6]] ***passive*** plural construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּדוּיֵּי‎</span> [[Isa.35.10|Isa 35:10]]; [[Isa.51.11|Isa 51:11]]; [[Num.3.49|Num 3:49]] also absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּדוּיִם‎</span> [[Num.3.51|Num 3:51]] ([[BDB#Qr|Qr]]; [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פדים‎</span>), construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּדוּיֵי‎</span> v[[Num.3.46|Num 3:46]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּדוּיָו‎</span> [[Num.18.16|Num 18:16]] (all noun abstract according to [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>ii. 1, 138</sup>, see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּדוּיִם‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּדְיֹם‎</span> below); — ***ransom:*** 

**1.** for an assessed price [[Exod.13.13|Exod 13:13]]; [[Exod.13.15|Exod 13:15]]; [[Exod.34.20|Exod 34:20]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Lev.27.27|Lev 27:27]]; [[Num.3.46|Num 3:46]]; [[Num.3.48|Num 3:48]]; [[Num.3.49|Num 3:49]]; [[Num.3.51|Num 3:51]]; [[Num.18.15|Num 18:15]]; [[Num.18.16|Num 18:16]]; [[Num.18.17|Num 18:17]] ([[BDB#P|P]]). 

**2.** from violence and death [[1Sam.14.45|1Sam 14:45]]; [[Job.6.23|Job 6:23]]; [[Ps.49.8|Ps 49:8]]. 

**3.** God subject (underlying thought of payment): 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** from Egypt, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִבֵּית עֲבָדִים‎</span> [[Deut.7.8|Deut 7:8]]; [[Deut.13.6|Deut 13:6]]; [[Mic.6.4|Mic 6:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִנִּיצָֿר‎</span> [[Ps.78.42|Ps 78:42]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ממצרים‎</span> [[2Sam.7.23|2Sam 7:23]] (but strike out <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּדִיתָ‎</span> [[BDB#Gei|Gei]]<sup>Urschr. 288</sup> [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] and others) = [[1Chr.17.21|1Chr 17:21]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִשָּׁם‎</span> [[Deut.24.18|Deut 24:18]] absolute [[Deut.9.26|Deut 9:26]]; [[Deut.15.15|Deut 15:15]]; [[Deut.21.8|Deut 21:8]]; [[Neh.1.10|Neh 1:10]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** from exile, [[Jer.31.11|Jer 31:11]]; [[Zech.10.8|Zech 10:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְשֻׁבוּן‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּדוּיֵּי י‎</span> [[Isa.35.10|Isa 35:10]] = [[Isa.51.11|Isa 51:11]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** in general [[Hos.7.13|Hos 7:13]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִכֹּל צָרוֺתָיו‎</span> [[Ps.25.22|Ps 25:22]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִכֹּל עֲוֺנוֺתָיו‎</span> [[Ps.130.8|Ps 130:8]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **d.** with accusative individual [[Ps.26.11|Ps 26:11]]; [[Ps.31.6|Ps 31:6]]; [[Ps.44.27|Ps 44:27]]; [[Ps.69.19|Ps 69:19]] Abraham [[Isa.29.22|Isa 29:22]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נפשׁ‎</span> [[Ps.34.23|Ps 34:23]]; [[Ps.71.23|Ps 71:23]] + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מכל צרה‎</span> [[2Sam.4.9|2Sam 4:9]]; [[1Kgs.1.29|1Kgs 1:29]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעֲבֹר בַּשָּׁ֑חַת‎</span> [[Job.33.28|Job 33:28]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִקְּרָבלִֿי‎</span> [[Ps.55.19|Ps 55:19]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִמָּוֶת‎</span> [[Job.5.20|Job 5:20]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מיד שׁאול‎</span> [[Ps.49.16|Ps 49:16]]; [[Hos.13.14|Hos 13:14]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעשֶׁק אָדָם‎</span> [[Ps.119.134|Ps 119:134]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִכַּף עָרִיצִים‎</span> [[Jer.15.21|Jer 15:21]]. **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular (+ **Hoph\`al** ***Infinitive absolute***) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָפְדֵּה לֹא נִפְדָּ֑תָה‎</span> [[Lev.19.20|Lev 19:20]] ***she hath not been at all ransomed*** (from bondage); ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִפָּדֶה‎</span> [[Lev.27.29|Lev 27:29]] (from ban); 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִיּוֺן בְּמִשְׁפָּט תִּפָּדֶ֑ה‎</span> [[Isa.1.27|Isa 1:27]]. **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהֶפְדָּהּ‎</span> [[Exod.21.8|Exod 21:8]] ***he shall let her be ransomed***. **Hiph\`il** ***Infinitive absolute*** see **Niph\`al**
